> .bridge .bridge-transfer .bridge-transfer-content .form-container .bridge-form-inputs{display:flex;justify-content:space-between}.footer{left:0;right:0}.container{position:relative;width:960px;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto}@media (max-width: >       // This causes an infinite loop and breaks people's browsers
>       // adding a time out to reduce the calls
>       setTimeout(() => {
>         this.getFeeEvents()
>       }, 500)
